response.original_title: A'BINBAL. Un verano sin fin, ni principio
response.overview: An innovative audiovisual collage blends documentary, fiction, and animation, crafted through training sessions for asylum seekers in Tapachula. This project seeks to build a collective narrative that utilizes cinematic tools to articulate the motivations behind their migration from their home countries. Through personal story reconstruction, it creates a poignant portrait of migration at the southern border.
response.title: A'BINBAL. Un verano sin fin, ni principio
